trans-unit.source: Results returned after a call to <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges*> when enumerating operation responses returned by the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫之後傳回結果<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges*>列舉作業所傳回的回應時<xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>類別</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges*>

trans-unit.source: ChangeOperationResponse objects are not intended to be constructed directly by a user of this library.
trans-unit.target: ChangeOperationResponse 物件不打算直接建構此文件庫的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Instead, references are returned when enumerating the operation responses returned via the enumerator on the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>類別</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>上透過列舉值列舉作業回應傳回時，相反地，傳回參考

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> submits pending changes to the data service collected by the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> since the last call to <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>提交暫止的變更<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext>自上次呼叫至<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>。</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A></xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext>所收集的資料服務</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes are added to the context by calling <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddObject%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddLink%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteObject%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteLink%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.Detach%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DetachLink%2A>, and similar methods.
trans-unit.target: 變更會藉由呼叫加入至內容<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddObject%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddLink%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteObject%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteLink%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.Detach%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DetachLink%2A>，和類似的方法。</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DetachLink%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.Detach%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteLink%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteObject%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddLink%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> returns a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> that represents the response to all operations sent to the data service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>傳回<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>，代表傳送至資料服務的所有作業的回應。</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse></xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> object includes a sequence of ChangeOperationResponse objects that, in turn, contain a sequence of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor> or <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor> instances that represent the changes that were persisted or attempted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>物件包含一連串的 ChangeOperationResponse 物件，其中依序包含一連串的<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor>或<xref:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor>執行個體，表示持續性或嘗試的變更。</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor"></xref> or <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor"></xref> modified by a change operation.
An <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor"></xref> or <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor"></xref> modified by a change operation.
